column1: .@JoeBiden built his campaign on restoring the soul of America. Now that he is our President-elect I know he will work to deliver on his promise to unite our country.
.@JoeBiden understands that there isn’t anything this country can’t do if we do it together. By electing Joe Biden Americans chose unity over division hope over hate. Let's get to work.
Too many Americans have been left behind over the last four years. Just like @JoeBiden said we must make the promises of our country real for all Americans. With his leadership we will.
We are all inspired by the history made by  @KamalaHarris. She is right - while she will be the first woman Vice President she will not be the last.

I join @KamalaHarris in acknowledging the Americans who turned out in record numbers "when our very democracy was on the ballot - with the very soul of democracy at stake" - you have restored our nation.
The American people have redeemed the soul and character of our democracy and America.
.@JoeBiden is right: We are going to win this race.

Trump is trying to undermine the integrity of this election by falsely claiming that he has won even though votes are still being counted. There are no "illegal" votes. Trump is lying to the American people. Votes are being counted that's how elections and democracy works.

This election will be over when all the results are accurately counted & certified. I remain confident that when all the votes are counted @JoeBiden will be named the next President. I urge all Americans to be patient as election officials do their jobs. https://t.co/mAesIR2oBC

I'm honored to once again receive the support of #MD05 families. Throughout my career I've fought for policies that help working families get ahead. I want to thank the voters for putting their faith in me & I look forward to continuing to fight for them. https://t.co/e4GRpi77hH
If you are in line to vote at 8:00 p.m. you will be allowed to cast your ballot. Stay in line! Ensure your voice is heard today. Get to your nearest vote center now: https://t.co/ZUR6tx5o1e
Glad to visit with @UofMaryland students today and thank them for participating in our democracy. #ElectionDay https://t.co/EUEaFxEeVQ

Have you voted yet? There's no time to waste. Head to your nearest voting center now and ensure your voice is heard. Polls are only open until 8:00 p.m. today. Click here to find your nearest vote center: https://t.co/ZUR6tx5o1e

Great to stop by the vote center at Huntingtown High School in Calvert County and thank hardworking volunteers. Make sure your voice is heard in this election before polls close at 8:00 P.M. You can find your polling place here: https://t.co/vw9ZJuPn4C #ElectionDay https://t.co/en8WdDS2Za
Do you know where your nearest voting center is? Polls are open until 8:00 p.m. today. Find a vote center near you here: https://t.co/ZUR6tx5o1e
Today is Election Day! Vote centers are open until 8:00 p.m. today. Voters may cast their ballot at any vote center in their county. For more information click here: https://t.co/D9yx8djs18

.@AmyKennedy715 can beat Jeff Van Drew but polls show this race is really tight and could be decided by just a few votes. Pitch in to help Amy turn out voters in the final days: https://t.co/uLcf4BZ6g5

I’m excited to be joining Biden’s Deputy National Political Director @JohnWMcCarthy for a #TeamJoeTalks where we'll discuss some of the important issues facing our country and ways you can get involved to fix them! Tune in: https://t.co/W21myoLu6M

Join me at 1:30 p.m. today as I speak with @JohnWMcCarthy about what’s at stake in Tuesday’s election. Make a plan to vote today - visit https://t.co/rO0PkSBS9y and ensure your voice is heard. #TeamJoeTalks https://t.co/J8MBx5BQed
Voters can cast their ballot at any polling location in their county. Click here to find an early voting location near you: https://t.co/uIe0lBddX1

Did you know that early voting continues through Monday in MD? I enjoyed visiting with voters yesterday in St. Mary's and Charles counties. Polls are open daily from 7:00 a.m. to 8:00 p.m. Make a plan to vote today and ensure your voice is heard! https://t.co/hYR3e1Xi9v

Gun violence impacts communities throughout Maryland and we must do more to protect the safety of our families. I'm proud to be endorsed by @Brady_PAC @GiffordsCourage and @Everytown. https://t.co/0Tt053EZ1d https://t.co/rl9YdWzr5W

No person should be penalized for who they love and every woman must have the right to make her own health care choices. I'm honored to be endorsed by @HRC and @PPact. https://t.co/oDdO8OGJjF https://t.co/4rrizajMDs

The climate crisis is felt by communities throughout #MD05 and it's critically important that we work together here at home to improve the health of our environment for future generations. https://t.co/P6yQTvc6ep https://t.co/UvbeQ1D8G4

Organized labor is the backbone of our workforce. I'm proud to stand with my brothers and sisters in labor and work alongside them to secure rights and benefits for Maryland workers. https://t.co/mb0GrHamIi https://t.co/w46Ja0R7e8

Early voting starts today in MD! Polls are open daily from 7:00 a.m. to 8:00 p.m. through November 2. Voters can cast their ballot at any early voting location in their county. To find a voting location near you click here: https://t.co/bIpRfw01jC

With 12 days until the election the choice is clear. I urge everyone who has not already voted to make a plan to do so. For 4 years Americans have waited for the opportunity to set our nation back on a steady course. That moment has now arrived. Vote.
Biden brought calm and composure respect and transparency. He offered straight answers to the tough questions and made it clear that he has a plan to defeat this pandemic and build back better.

Tonight Trump failed to explain how he would keep Americans safe from COVID-19 or help those struggling in our economy. He failed to show them that he takes their concerns seriously or has a policy agenda for a second term. https://t.co/A1srbicj4Z

Federal employees ensure our government runs effectively for the American people. I'm honored to be endorsed for reelection by @AFSCME @NTEUnews & @AFGENational. https://t.co/0k3jIyIIBw https://t.co/ABHybld9jB

TODAY is the last day to request a ballot to vote by mail in the November 3 election. Visit https://t.co/rO0PkSBS9y now to request your ballot and turn it in as soon as possible! https://t.co/aCQBZnBbac

I'm proud to fight for #MD05 in Congress and I'll continue working to improve access to affordable health care protect our environment address racial injustice and get our economy back on track. It's an honor to represent Marylanders in Congress. https://t.co/2YkYAQRyYv

Are you registered to vote in the November 3 election? Today is the last day to register to vote or change your registration online. Visit https://t.co/YbbfMTYoht now and make sure your voice is heard. https://t.co/5RemIz4bvJ

Great to join @MDDems Chair Yvette Lewis & @TorreySmithWR for a timely chat about the importance of voting in this election. Make sure you have a plan to vote & vote early if you can! Questions about voting? Visit https://t.co/zVCePDu03E today. https://t.co/rpyx6VA4dv

Senator Harris showed America that a Biden Administration will be focused on pragmatic solutions to address our greatest challenges. With voting already underway in many states I urge Americans to make a plan to vote and do so at their earliest opportunity.

VP Pence tried to defend President Trump's record of unending chaos crisis and confrontation but the actions of the Trump Administration are simply indefensible. His own record leading the federal response to the pandemic has been dismal with more than 210000 Americans lost.

Tonight @KamalaHarris made a powerful case for what's at stake: containing the pandemic access to health care jobs & opportunities for Americans. She is ready to share in the work of restoring America and building back better from the pandemic.  https://t.co/CrWGlH419E

Donald Trump has made America weaker. As @KamalaHarris just said: "The strength of our nation in addition to the great military is that we keep our word. Trump doesn't understand that because he doesn't understand what it means to be honest."

Trump and Pence have said for four years that they have a health care plan. We know what their plan is: to end the Affordable Care Act taking health care away from millions of Americans and ending protections for Americans with pre-existing conditions.
.@KamalaHarris reminds Americans that Trump measures the strength of the economy based on how rich people are doing. A Biden/Harris Administration will restore our economy so that it works for you.

.@KamalaHarris is right: "You respect the American people when you tell them the truth." Trump and Pence knew that COVID was airborne and deadly and they didn't tell Americans the truth. Now more than 210000 Americans are dead.

It's not too late to request your mail-in ballot! Marylanders have until October 20 to request their ballot so don't delay! Visit https://t.co/XwaRP7Cmf5 today and make sure your voice is heard on November 3. #ProudToVote https://t.co/85plZmgl5W

In sharp contrast Trump showed his disrespect for America's democratic processes. His penchant for lying and ignoring the facts was on full display. So were his disturbing answers when confronted about important issues including refusing to reject white supremacists.

Tonight as he has done all his life @JoeBiden showed respect and seriousness as he responded to the questions that are on the minds of Americans. He is ready to restore the soul and character of our nation. https://t.co/fh8fySs7Cg

ICYMI: I was glad to join @MPTNews last night to discuss the upcoming presidential debate and how Republicans and President Trump continue to work to undermine the #ACA and take away health care from millions of American families. https://t.co/2A4fFsXsw9

Make no mistake this November our environment is on the ballot. Trump has rolled back clean air and clean water protections; a conservative Court could uphold those actions harming public health; & damage our ability to confront climate change. https://t.co/i48SacgvT8

Are you registered to vote? This election will be the most important of our lifetime. On #NationalVoterRegistrationDay register to vote or update your registration by visiting https://t.co/YbbfMTYoht. Don't sit this one out. https://t.co/DcUwmCSPY8
I'll continue working with @ActForParks to protect our state's many natural resources and ensure our air is safe and water is clean.

I'm pleased to receive an "A" rating from @ActForParks on their 2020 Congressional Scorecard. Safeguarding our environment is critically important especially in MD. I was proud to bring the Great American Outdoors Act to the House Floor and secure its passage this summer.

Listen to @BarackObama and make sure you are registered to vote by visiting https://t.co/BeaCmf46BM today. After you register make a plan to vote early and ensure your voice is heard in the November 3 election. https://t.co/FZOhD6KRNu

With @JoeBiden as President all Americans will be heard and respected not ignored or denied the resources they need. We can start by making Puerto Rico a state should Puerto Ricans choose to do so. https://t.co/ykvGarZC8d

There are only 50 days before the election & I encourage everyone to make a plan to vote. Visit https://t.co/rO0PkSBS9y to:   🗓️ Find important dates & deadlines 📝 Check your registration ✉️ Request a mail-in ballot.  Get started today!

26 years ago #VAWA was signed into law. We need a President that will strengthen the law and stand up for survivors of domestic violence. @JoeBiden wrote the landmark bill and as President will strengthen its protections. https://t.co/Vjreh2Okoo

House Dems' Make It In America plan has come a long way over the years! I'm excited that @JoeBiden recognizes the importance of supporting manufacturing and creating good-paying jobs here at home. https://t.co/Vp3iLmr4xL

Thanks for the shout-out @playbookplus! It may feel like a century since I launched the Make It In America plan but it's as important today as it was 10 years ago. @JoeBiden knows if our nation & workers are going to succeed we need to make it in America! https://t.co/EauA1Iuqii

.@JoeBiden will fight hard each day of his Presidency to ensure hard working Americans have the opportunity to make it in America. I look forward to working with Joe to grow our manufacturing sector and put in place policies that help American workers and businesses get ahead. https://t.co/oHRq6RA5RI

For 10 years I've been proud to lead House Democrats’ Make It In America plan for jobs & opportunity. I'm excited that @JoeBiden announced policies today that draw on our plan to bring good jobs home & enable American workers to get ahead. https://t.co/AdFI89wLcl
That’s why I joined 70 of my House colleagues to call on @debates to make climate change a key focus during the upcoming debates. Read more here:  https://t.co/1TLxEsyrzF
In 2016 not a single question was asked during the Presidential debates about climate change. We can’t let that happen again. https://t.co/JWQsFrGuA7
Great advice @KamalaHarris. We're all in this together and it's imperative that we all do our part to stop the spread. https://t.co/JWAwEHpKU5

.@JoeBiden's speech today in Pittsburgh made a convincing case that Americans will not be safe under four more years of Donald Trump. This President makes our challenges harder to meet not easier. https://t.co/W58m0c6HQI

Trump claims that he alone can keep America safe but our troops who protect and serve our country know differently. Our servicemembers support @JoeBiden. https://t.co/ZkFafzg5ma https://t.co/lwGBf55Ojb

Joe Biden & Kamala Harris will bring Americans together to meet our challenges not drive us apart. They are ready to lead us out of this crisis and ensure that America can build back better. They are ready to restore the soul and character of America after this presidency.

No matter how hard Trump tries to ignore that 180000 Americans have now died of a virus he called a hoax no matter how much he lies about his failed economic record he cannot trick Americans into believing that our country can handle four more years of Donald Trump’s America.

Americans who tuned in to the Republican convention heard a bleak dismal preview of what a second term of Donald Trump would look like. We listened to lie after lie about the state of our union this President’s record and Joe Biden’s character. https://t.co/yIqhcDM05j
As a reminder here's what a strong thoughtful serious presidential nomination acceptance speech sounds like: https://t.co/GgwDwnUNOn

Let’s be clear Jeff Van Drew switched parties to try and save his political career not because it helps his constituents. @AmyKennedy715 will never put her interests over her constituents. Donate here: https://t.co/wD7XoogjrG

It was great to join so many #MD05 women for my annual Women's Equality Day Lunch. Did you miss it? Rewatch the entire program here including a great keynote speech from my friend @KarenBasstweets: https://t.co/vCHHXSSBm2

Pence & other speakers pretend the pandemic is already over or lie about Trump's response but the facts are clear: Trump's travel restrictions came too late he didn't secure PPE supplies he didn't ramp up testing. Due to his lack of leadership we've lost nearly 180000 lives.
I'm ready for @KamalaHarris to be our Vice President. Are you?   https://t.co/LUZ1JfHDKy

From fighting for #equalpay to expanding women’s access to health care @JoeBiden and @KamalaHarris will ensure more women can #MakeItInAmerica. This #WomensEqualityDay join me in making a plan to vote early. Text VOTE to 30330 to get started. https://t.co/oI7TDqvZ2D

No matter how hard Trump and Republicans try to rewrite history he inherited a surging economy from the Obama recovery. He slowed the rate of monthly job growth and exploded the deficit before failing to stop a pandemic that has cost 30M jobs.

My virtual Women's Equality Day Lunch begins at 12:00 p.m. I hope you'll join me and @KarenBassTweets for this free event to celebrate the 100th anniversary of women's suffrage. Click here to RSVP and watch the event: https://t.co/UKBaD7Bzer

Night 1 of the DNC Michelle Obama said Trump's divisiveness "is not who we want to be." Night 1 of the RNC showed us how willing he is to divide our country through fear & cynicism. We must not allow the darkness of fear to dim the light of our democracy. https://t.co/EtCPdDmBiW
Just a quick fact check: Trump ignored the virus and said it would magically disappear. As a direct result of his failure to show leadership more than 170000 Americans are dead.

It's not too late to RSVP to my virtual Women's Equality Day Lunch! Join me and @KarenBassTweets TOMORROW at 12:00 p.m. for this free virtual event to celebrate the 100th anniversary of women's suffrage. RSVP here → https://t.co/4pI3f3D7Dc https://t.co/gkIVlsoXBS

With our outstanding nominees for President and Vice President Democrats are fired up and ready to work harder than ever to ensure that every voter has a chance to participate this year and that our ticket can deliver change for the American people that is so sorely needed.
A man of empathy and intellect experience and talent @JoeBiden is the president we need to restore the soul and promise of America after the disastrous four years of the failed Trump Administration.

Tonight @JoeBiden accepted the Democratic Party's nomination to serve as the next President of the United States. He will be a president for all Americans and will work to bring our country together to confront and surmount our greatest challenges.   https://t.co/KA20M5bqlX https://t.co/6PCBksWYYf

Tonight's the night! Night 4 of the #DemConvention begins soon and I'm looking forward to seeing @JoeBiden accept the nomination for President of the United States. Who else is watching? https://t.co/d0y1ITammO https://t.co/tYzexuVskO

I look forward to campaigning with @KamalaHarris and @JoeBiden in the weeks ahead to share their vision with voters in Maryland and across the country.  Democrats are excited and ready to work hard to make her the next Vice President of the United States.

Tonight @KamalaHarris made history by accepting the nomination of our party to become America's first female Black & South Asian VP. It is clear that she is ready to get to work on day one alongside @JoeBiden in renewing the soul of America. https://t.co/wKWLwzFsc0 https://t.co/o7PCgNVwLv

What a powerful speech by @BarackObama tonight laying out the grave stakes of this election. As he said Trump does not take the job of the presidency seriously and he continues to undermine our democracy while @JoeBiden's character and experience will make us a better country.

.@SpeakerPelosi laid out why we need @JoeBiden in the White House - a President who will work with the Democratic-led House to enact policies that make real progress for the people from lowering health care costs to rebuilding infrastructure to cleaning up government.

I agree with @HillaryClinton - Donald Trump doesn't know how to be President and this can't be another "woulda coulda shoulda" election. @JoeBiden and @KamalaHarris are the team we need to pull our nation back from the brink.
My dear friend @GabbyGiffords is truly an inspiration to us all. And she's right - @JoeBiden will be there for us and take long overdue action to prevent gun violence in our communities.
I'm ready to watch night #3 of the #DemConvention and I'm looking forward to hearing from many great speakers. Who are you most excited to hear from? https://t.co/d0y1ISSLvg https://t.co/Mzq57T3dmP

Have you RSVP'd to my 18th annual Women's Equality Day Lunch? Join me and @KarenBassTweets on August 25 at 12:00 p.m. for this free virtual event to celebrate the 100th anniversary of women's suffrage. RSVP here → https://t.co/4pI3f3UIuK https://t.co/jzq4pbRaRR

.@DrBiden will be a wonderful kind and compassionate First Lady. She and Joe will put the American people first and help our nation heal from the divisiveness and hateful rhetoric of the Trump Administration.

Vice President @JoeBiden is a man of principle & has the leadership to unite our country & restore the soul of America. Now that he is officially the Democratic nominee let's get to work! It will take us all working together to reject the Trump Administration & elect Joe. https://t.co/uNxU2oOhVA

Great to see future Baltimore Mayor @CouncilPresBMS and Marylander Bianca Shah cast Maryland's nominating votes for @JoeBiden. As they so eloquently said the Biden Administration will tackle racial injustice and inequality to make our nation fairer and more inclusive for all. https://t.co/Zkg244rRvz
As @BillClinton just said with Trump it will be four more years of blame bully and belittle. @JoeBiden will build back better. He's right: it's a clear choice.
I agree wholeheartedly with my friend @BillClinton - @JoeBiden brought us back from a recession before and he will do it again through smart and detailed plans that put American workers first.
After a fantastic opening night yesterday I'm excited to watch the second night of the #DemConvention tonight. Who else is tuning in? Comment below. https://t.co/o8NX3dOLeY
My good friend @ClyburnSC06 is right: @JoeBiden will work to heal our nation's wounds and bring Americans together. #DemConvention

Night #1 of #DemConvention begins soon! Are you tuning in? Watch the entire program this evening including remarks from @ClyburnSC06 @BernieSanders & @MichelleObama here → https://t.co/waSu7Ab6Gd https://t.co/og6Oglqk5v
I’m saddened to learn of the death of Joseph Kitchen an extraordinary Prince Georgian who led @YoungDemsofMD for many years. My thoughts are with his family friends and the Young Dems community.

I'm honored once again to serve as #DemConvention Parliamentarian. Though this convention will be different Dems are excited to nominate Joe Biden & Kamala Harris to lead America in building back better after four disastrous years of Donald Trump. https://t.co/U213dOUmkM https://t.co/hyYvvw6Don

.@KamalaHarris is a fantastic choice for Vice President and I'm excited to work hard over the next three months to help elect @JoeBiden and @KamalaHarris. Are you ready to get to work? https://t.co/mgEqz0yl3T

Voting by mail is an important way to make sure your voice is heard on November 3 but it's also an easy way to keep yourself safe during the coronavirus pandemic. Follow these step-by-step instructions to request a ballot by mail: https://t.co/5xuPSDdTdz
Worried about voting in the November election? Here’s how to request a Maryland mail-in ballot today: https://t.co/5yD1f9yIUw

John Lewis made his country better and his life was an example to us all. We must continue to honor his legacy and strive to keep up the #goodtrouble he called on us to make. I'm so blessed to have known John and to call him a dear friend.  https://t.co/OClqszb6tn https://t.co/KPDbGRhel9

This morning I helped distribute 3000 meals my campaign donated to families in need & frontline health care workers in Prince George’s County. We’ve got to stick together during this pandemic and I’m proud to help my fellow Marylanders. https://t.co/Kh0baMFgdi
Congratulations to Ella Jones on her victory and for making history as the first African American and first woman elected mayor of Ferguson. https://t.co/20Gioctvhc
There is much work ahead and I am honored that the voters have once again placed their faith in me as we engage in that work together.

I will keep listening to constituents in order to be the most effective voice as possible for the Fifth District in Congress. Together we will fight for universal access to health care effective criminal justice reform & stronger protections for our environment.
To all who are in deep pain right now: I see you I hear you and I stand with you as we work to ensure that the promise of America is the reality of America.

We grieve those we have lost to COVID-19 and we grieve those we have lost to racism and injustice. Our grief gives us strength to rise to the challenges that confront us and we are determined to build a more perfect union.

It is a vision where all can make it in America regardless of background. And it is a vision of a nation where one's race gender faith or national origin does not limit what one can achieve or raise stumbling blocks to success.

As our nation faces multiple crises Democrats and all Americans must come together and fight for our vision for this nation. It is a vision where we are stronger together and where our greatness is reflected in our diversity.

I’m honored that #MD05 Dems once again selected me to be their nominee. I will continue to fight every day for the values of our party and our District for equality justice and opportunity for all. https://t.co/zH6SHMwSIb https://t.co/QtVoC33FLD

Just one hour until polls close! Have you voted yet? Drop off your ballot in a ballot box location now or vote in person. Anyone in line by 8pm can vote.  Click here to find a location near you: https://t.co/DBXDt2cd7K

Voting in the primary election is almost over! Have you voted yet? Share a selfie of you dropping off your ballot below and encourage your friends to drop off their ballot or vote at an in-person polling location. Anyone in line by 8pm can vote.

The MD BOE has confirmed some voters who didn’t receive a ballot in the mail were mistakenly labeled already voted. These voters should fill out a provisional ballot at their polling location & their vote will be counted. Call my campaign if you have questions:  (301) 464-5710
Less than 8 hours until polls close. Have you returned your ballot yet? Click here to find a polling or ballot drop box location near you: https://t.co/DBXDt2cd7K
Have questions? Visit my website https://t.co/ERRQgx50nW for more information.

In-person poll in Charles County:  -Sacred Heart Friendship Hall  In-person poll in Calvert County:  -Community Resources Building  In-person poll in St. Mary’s County:  -Hollywood Firehouse Main Building
In-person polls in Prince George’s County:  -College Park Community Center -Bowie Gymnasium -Kentland Community Center -Southern Regional Technology and Recreation Complex
In-person polls in Anne Arundel County:  -Odenton Regional Library -Glen Burnie Regional Library -Severna Park Community Library -Roger “Pip” Moyer Recreation Center

There are only a few in-person polling locations open in #MD05 until 8:00 p.m. this evening. If you need to vote in-person please practice social distancing and wear a mask to keep you and our election workers safe.

TODAY is Election Day in Maryland! If you haven’t voted yet drop off your ballot in a ballot drop box location before 8:00 p.m. this evening. Click here to find a location near you: https://t.co/DBXDt2cd7K

Honored to be endorsed by LCV Action Fund. The climate crisis is an extremely serious threat facing communities in MD. I'll continue working with LCV to improve the health of our environment & fight for environmental justice for communities of color. https://t.co/wHqMKaKAJW

I appreciate the endorsements of the SEIU Maryland & DC State Council & Teamsters Local 639. Organized labor is responsible for the economic success of our nation & I'll continue to advocate and be an ally for the working men & women of Maryland. https://t.co/lZP2h0PONY
Have questions? Visit my website https://t.co/DBXDt2cd7K for more information.

Charles County ↓  -Sacred Heart Friendship Hall -Charles County Board of Elections  Calvert County ↓  -Community Resources Building  St. Mary’s County ↓  -Hollywood Firehouse Main Building -St. Mary’s County Board of Elections

TOMORROW is Election Day! Ballots must be postmarked by June 2 or returned to a ballot drop box by 8:00 p.m. Now more than ever it’s important to exercise our fundamental right to vote & make our voices heard. Ballot drop boxes are available in each of the 5 counties in #MD05.

We must come together w all of our talent w all of our passion w all of our commitment to change America — to make it all that it can be. That’s why we’ve come together to elect Joe Biden and to make the promises of America the realities of America. https://t.co/NLQL6ruQ7F

We must bring our country together not drive it apart. I'm proud to endorse @JoeBiden. This election is the most important of my lifetime & I strongly believe that Joe is the person to bring us together to confront the extraordinary challenges we face. https://t.co/3YjFHuaZNw

Today we grieve the loss of George Floyd & the many others we’ve lost because of the systematic racism that plagues our country. We see the pain anger fear & excruciating frustration at the loss of these lives w/o accountability. #BlackLivesMatter.

TOMORROW: Join me and MD Dems for a special announcement at a virtual Get Out the Vote rally ahead of the Tuesday primary election.  The event begins at 3:00 p.m. - RSVP here now: https://t.co/goHBEpMfR7 https://t.co/VCZeK24Y35

I'm honored to receive @HRC's endorsement. We must keep fighting to achieve justice & equality for all Marylanders. I look forward to continuing to work with @HRC to fight against President Trump's hateful anti-LGBTQ policies. https://t.co/L6rj7naEKD https://t.co/SrnMVkaGhe

Have you returned your ballot yet? It's not too late to make your voice heard in Tuesday's primary election. Return your ballot in the mail today or drop it off in a ballot box location. Click here to find a list of locations in #MD05: https://t.co/DBXDt2cd7K

Ballots are due in 4 days! Drop your completed ballot in the mail or at a ballot box location today to ensure your voice is heard on June 2. Click here to learn more about voting by mail in #MD05: https://t.co/DBXDt2cd7K

I'm so proud to be endorsed by @Brady_PAC @GiffordsCourage & @Everytown. Deadly gun violence is a horrific scourge that plagues our communities. I will continue to work with these orgs to push for measures that keep our people safe from gun violence. https://t.co/uOuOcFcc3D

Pleased to be endorsed by @UAPipeTrades IBEW Local 26 & @UFCW400 whose members play a critical role in #MD05's economy and the broader movement for workers' rights. I'll continue to partner with them & fight for working families in our state. https://t.co/PD9x8sVjFT
Election Day is Tuesday and ballots must be postmarked by June 2 or dropped off in a ballot box by 8:00 p.m. on June 2. Click here for a list of ballot boxes in #MD05 → https://t.co/DBXDt2cd7K

Proud to receive @NALC_National's endorsement. Postal workers play a critical role in our democracy and our economy and I will continue to stand up for their right to organize for better pay and benefits. https://t.co/qMrYOKqOyD

The men and women of @32BJSEIU are on the frontlines of the coronavirus pandemic and I'm honored to receive their endorsement. I'll continue fighting for them & working to ensure they have the resources they need to stay safe. https://t.co/uT9xLIPJRA
